title: there's a really simple solution to nerfing Maokai
body:
just make more lumberjack skins 

it's siontifically proven that lumberjack skins hard counter maokai, and since riot wants more hard counters, it's only logical to make more lumberjack skins

here's some suggestions for lumberjack skins

{{champion:75}} {{champion:122}} both get a lumberjack axe for cuttin' them trees (darius gets a beard)

{{champion:86}} gets a nice big saw blade for cuttin' them trees (garen gets a beard) 

there ya go riot, maokai gets some counters and you make some money. i get 25 cents for every skin you sell as royalties, y'know, Just a lil' somethin my way for helpin' ya out so much, help a homie out i scratch ur back u scratch my back y'know

replies.body: This belongs in Memes and Games, not Misc.
